text: Karachi Port Trust Halt railway station (, Sindhi: ڪراچي پورٽ ٽرسٽ هالٽ ريلوي اسٽيشن) is located in Karachi, Pakistan. ==See also== * List of railway stations in Pakistan * Pakistan Railways ==References== ==External links== *Official Web Site of Pakistan Railways Category:Railway stations in Karachi Category:Railway stations on Karachi Circular Railway
title: Karachi Port Trust Halt railway station
